text: Seventh Heaven () is a 1997 French drama film directed by Benoît Jacquot. == Cast == * Sandrine Kiberlain - Mathilde * Vincent Lindon - Nico * François Berléand - The doctor * Francine Bergé - Mathilde's mother * Pierre Cassignard - Étienne * Florence Loiret Caille - Chloé * Eriq Ebouaney ==References== == External links == * Category:1997 drama films Category:French drama films Category:French films Category:Films directed by Benoît Jacquot
title: Seventh Heaven (1997 film)
